local_intent: Lift the grasped garbage can lid upward by 0.2 m along the z axis, ensuring the grasp remains secure.
assumptions: Lid is already grasped before this step
Positive z corresponds to upward motion with safe clearance
coherence_with_global: Implements the MoveDelta(z,+0.2,1500ms) transfer step that occurs after Pick and before OpenContainer in the GLOBAL_BT.
